pageTitle: Anyone else fancy an R2?: Sony Cyber-shot Talk Forum: Digital Photography Review
textBeforeTable: Flat view Next unread Next Previous First Parent Forum Complain Reply to thread   Reply with quote   I know this doesn't really invite questions, but if we all subscribe, maybe someone at Sony will take note and be brave enough to endorse an upgrade of a legend. R1 rules!! C'mon folks - lets see who cares..... However, if enough of us wanted the product, surely Sony would have to take notice as the profits would be huge. I hazard a guess that the R1 is the last of it's kind, as a successor would steal sales of A700 along with other D-SLR. Same general spec, but with CCD stabiliser,
